sentences.english: During the War of Liberation the policy of land reform was carried out in some newly-liberated areas.
sentences.chinese: 在解放戰爭時期，一些新解放區內實行了土改政策。

sentences.english: The Land Reform is widely conducted in the time of war and achieves success at last.
sentences.chinese: 土改在戰爭環境中得到普遍開展，並最終取得勝利。

sentences.english: We resolutely carried the land reform through.
sentences.chinese: 我們堅決地完成了土改。

sentences.english: The industrial and commercial problem was an important one that arose in the land reform in southern Jiangsu.
sentences.chinese: 工商業問題是蘇南土改中遇到的一個重要問題。

sentences.english: When he had first instituted the land reform in Toumachuang, the Field Mouse had organized a militia band to operate against the Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 地老鼠開始搞土改時，組織了一支民兵抗擊日本人。

sentences.english: But the Land-Innovating Movement didn't solve the poverty problem of the peasants.
sentences.chinese: 但是，土改運動並沒有完全改變所有農民的貧窮問題。

sentences.english: During the land reform each person got 1.3 mu of land.
sentences.chinese: 土改時每人領得一畝三分地。

sentences.english: The Party led us to carry out the land reform.
sentences.chinese: 黨領導我們實行了土改。

sentences.english: This thesis regards land-reform novels as the research object.
sentences.chinese: 本文以土改小說爲研究對象。

sentences.english: The despot and traitor was brought to public trial during the land reform and all his crimes were exposed.
sentences.chinese: 土改時公審了那個惡霸兼漢奸，並揭露了其全部罪行。

sentences.english: They carried out land reform in 1952.
